result.heading: WALT DISNEY PICTURES PRESENTS LELAND TURBO

direction.raw_text: : WALT DISNEY PICTURES PRESENTS LELAND TURBO Finn. My cover's been compromised. Everything's gone pear-shaped.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A PIXAR ANIMATION STUDIOS FILM LELAND TURBO

direction.raw_text: : A PIXAR ANIMATION STUDIOS FILM LELAND TURBO You won't believe what I've found out here. He angles our camera view, reveals a PORTHOLE through which we can see flames rising in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is bigger than anything we've ever seen. And no one even knows it exists. Finn, I need backup. But don't call the cavalry - it could blow the operation. And be careful. It's not safe out here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .S. Time for Turbo to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Transmitting my grids now. Good luck! Coordinates appear: 40 6.80' N - 172 23.84' W TITLE CARD: CARS 2 EXT. SOMEWHERE IN THE NORTH PACIFIC - NIGHT A TINY CRAB BOAT (CRABBY) crests over massive swells.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright buddy, we're here. Right where you paid me to bring you. Question is, why? A metallic blue sports car, circa the `60s, emerges from the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . shadows. Cagey, smooth, he'd turn heads driving through any intersection in the world. Meet FINN MCMISSILE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm looking for a car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A car? Hey pal, you can't get any further away from land than out here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly where I want to be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well I got news for you, buddy. There's nobody out here but us. Suddenly, a HORN -- a COMBAT SHIP, the size of most cruise ships. FINN quickly backs into the shadows, out of sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing out here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does it look like, genius? I'm crabbing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well turn around and go back where you came from.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah? And who's gonna make me? A laser sight hits Crabby between the eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, alright! Don't get your prop in a twist. (as he turns to leave) What a jerk. Sorry, buddy. Looks like it's the end of the line. Buddy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Finn is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - He HANGS off the side of COMBAT SHIP, clandestine. We're with Finn as the ship continues on, cuts through the darkness with purpose. Suddenly small flames appear, perhaps a knot or so away. Then WHOOSH!!! A flame rises above Finn, the ship. It illuminates an OIL DERRICK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Finn fires a GRAPPLING HOOK to the derrick and SWINGS toward it. He's going to SLAM into the side with brute force
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sprout a magnetic exoskeleton. He STICKS to the derrick and now DRIVES VERTICALLY UP UP UP... From this vantage point, hundreds of derricks appear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finn approaches a loading bay from above, hides. He watches as GREMLINS, PACERS and assorted other cars scurry about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leland Turbo, this is Finn McMissile. I'm at the rally point. Over. No response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leland, it's Finn. Please respond. Over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: below. A boxy, monacle-wearing German car enters. This is PROFESSOR OTTO ZUNDAPP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German and English) Too many cars here. Out of my way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Professor Zundapp?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Here it is, Professor. Zundapp approaches a NOSY PACER who idles next to a CRATE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanted to see this before we load it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, yes. Very carefully... A forklift opens the crate -- inside is a TV CAMERA, packed carefully in foam. Finn SNAPS PHOTOS FURIOUSLY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. A TV camera. What does it actually do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This camera is extremely dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you up to now, Professor? Finn, angling for a better view, FIRES SUSPENSION WIRES --- --- which sail clear to the other side of the derrick --- --- THOK! They hook tightly onto a steel girder. Finn slides out ONTO THE WIRE like an acrobat, then expels another cross-wire for support.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is valuable equipment. Make sure it is properly secured for the voyage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got it. Finn LOWERS HIMSELF. He snaps more pictures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hey, Professor Z! Zundapp turns as a CRANE LOWERS A CAR-SIZED CRATE. GREM and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: an orange Gremlin and a green Pacer, flank it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is one of those British spies we told you about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. This one we caught sticking his bumper where it didn't belong. Finn PRODUCES SEMI-AUTOMATIC GUNS from his side, readies himself for a tag-team spy fight with his buddy Leland.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agent Leland Turbo. The crate is lifted, revealing a CRUSHED, CUBED Leland Turbo. Finn's eyes go wide. Suddenly --- WHOOOSHHH! Another derrick flame rises behind him, casts a Finn-shaped SHADOW over the Professor. He looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Finn McMissile! He's seen the camera! Kill him!! Finn UNLOADS with bullets as he starts to retreat --- He
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are waiting for him on the catwalk where he just came from - BLOWTORCHES ready. Finn, stuck in midair, notices an angry CRANE. Finn GRINS, having just found his escape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! Finn releases three of his four cables, swinging, Indiana Jones-style on the last one TOWARD THE CRANE ---
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: where he lands on its BOOM, drives UP and LAUNCHES OFF IT where he LANDS - MOVING - onto another deck! Finn now DRIVES, spraying oil and screeching around corners.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in pursuit hits the oil patch, loses control --- --- and PLUMMETS OFF the side of the rig! The Gremlin FALLS... it's like an eternity... He smashes into the water and breaks into a million pieces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Now set upon by 20 or 30 MORE pursuing cars. He has nowhere to go but UP UP UP a ramp toward the helipad. He spies some GASOLINE BARRELS, fires a SINGLE BULLET which cuts through its leather straps, sending barrels DOWN the ramp,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the pursuing CARS --- --- to the bottom where they EXPLODE in a CHAIN REACTION back
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: taking out at least 15 CARS!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Finn blasts into view, pulls to a stop. No more road. Nowhere else to go. The 20 BAD GUY CARS that are still in pursuit surround him, fire up their blowtorches. About to pounce. Finn GRINS. The second time we've seen this grin. It means he's got something cooking. Finn's REVERSE LIGHTS appear. He DRIVES BACKWARD off the edge of the helipad to the SHOCK of the other cars. Finn falls. He turns himself so he's grill first, cleanly cutting into the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He EMERGES, now sprouting HYDROFOIL and speeds away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get to the boats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - an army of combat ships quickly DROP into the sea and CHURN WATER with unprecedented fury as they quickly make up the distance between them and Finn, FIRING BULLETS as they do so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's getting away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not for long. The LEAD COMBAT SHIP quietly drops a TORPEDO into the water. It skips along, connecting with Finn in his rear and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with such force that water skyrockets into the night clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - McMissile SINKS. Then, he blinks. He GRINS. We're starting to like this grin and what follows it. He now
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into a submarine. From his trunk he releases four
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: tires which float to the surface like body parts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Professor Zundapp watches it all from far away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's dead, Professor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wunderbar. With Finn McMissile gone, who can stop us now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a rusty tow truck, putters into view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater. Tow Mater, that's who... is here to help you! He approaches a broken-down sedan on the side of the road. He drives around to the front, catching OTIS' face for the first time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Otis!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Mater. Gosh, I'm so sorry. I thought I could make it this time, but... (he tries to start his engine, stalls) Smooth like pudding, huh? Ah, who am I kidding? I'll always be a lemon. Mater hooks his friend and starts towing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well dadgum, you're leaking oil again. Must be your gaskets. Hey, look on the bright side: This is your tenth tow this month, so that means it's on the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're the only one that's nice to lemons like me, Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't sweat it. These things happen to everybody, Otis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you never leak oil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but I ain't perfect. Don't tell nobody, but I think my rust is starting to show through. Mater and Otis drive past THE RADIATOR SPRINGS WELCOME SIGN. It has been amended to say: "Home of Lightning McQueen."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, is Lightning McQueen back yet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He must be crazy-excited about winning his fourth Piston Cup. Four! Wow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, we're so dadgum proud of him. But I sure wish he'd hurry up and get back `cause we got a whole summer's worth of best friend fun to make up for. Just me and -- Ahead of them, a half-mile off, a RED RACE CAR is visible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McQueen! Mater FLOORS IT, dragging poor Otis behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, Mater? I'm in no hurry. You don't need to go so fast! Boom! They hit a bump. Otis catches air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lightning McQueen is surrounded by his hometown friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Lightning. Welcome home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good to have you back, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome home, soldier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The place wasn't the same without you, son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Did he go somewhere?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's good to be home, everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) McQueen! They all turn around, see Mater speeding into town, with Otis swerving behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McQueen! Mater skids into main street and in one swift motion, slingshots Otis forward --- OTIS Woaahhhhh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: right through Ramone's front door --- INT. RAMONE'S - CONTINUOUS --- where he lands perfectly on the hydraulic lift. Ramone lifts him up, routine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. How far'd you make it this time, Otis?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Halfway to the county line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, I can't believe it either!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McQueen, welcome back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, it's so good to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You too, buddy. Mater and McQueen do an ELABORATE TIRE BUMP (fist bump style).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man. You ain't gonna believe the things I got planned for us. Everyone watches as the tire bump continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Lizzie, an aside) These best friend greetings get longer every year.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready to have some serious fun?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, actually I've got something to show you first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . It has now changed, been adorned with a small likeness of Doc. It says "Hudson Hornet Piston Cup."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. I can't believe they renamed the Piston Cup after our very own Doc Hudson. McQueen and Mater are alone, the museum closed to the public. McQueen approaches a "Hudson Hornet" wall with Doc's three Piston cups, framed articles, other racing ephemera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know Doc said these things were just old cups, but to have someone else win it just didn't feel right, you know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Doc would've been real proud of you. That's for sure. McQueen takes this in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McQueen and Mater exit the Doc Hudson Museum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, pal. I've been waiting all summer for this. What've you got planned?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure you can handle it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, you know who you're talking to? This is Lightning McQueen. I can handle anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater and McQueen roll on an old train track, their tires off. They're on their rims.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh.... Mater?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just remember, your brakes ain't gonna work on these! As they head INTO A DARK TUNNEL --- MCQUEEN (O.S.) Mater!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Relax, these train tracks ain't been used in years! From inside the tunnel a loud TRAIN HORN. The two friends emerge, going as fast as they can on train tracks, uphill, with no tires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, come on! Faster, faster! Moments later a harmless GALLOPING GOOSE appears, oversized horn visible, cackling and laughing at his prank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An ENORMOUS EARTH MOVER sleeps. McQueen and Mater sneak up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is gonna be good! They blow their horns and he TIPS OVER, tractor-tipping style. They LAUGH at the gag, but soon realize the earth mover's GIANT EXHAUST PIPE is directly above them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh. This ain't gonna be good. The exhaust pipe BELCHES. McQueen and Mater are BLASTED out of view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sun sets. McQueen and Mater roll into town. McQueen looks exhausted. Mater is still full of energy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy, this was the best day ever! And my favorite souvenir? Mater proudly shows off a dent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This new dent!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy, Mater. Today was, uh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoot, that was nothing. Wait til you see what I got planned for tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, Mater. Whoa. I was kind of thinking of just a quiet dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's exactly what I was thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I... I meant with Sally, Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even better! You, me and Miss Sally going out for supper. McQueen pulls around in front of Mater, stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, I meant it would be just me and Sally.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just for tonight. We'll do whatever you want tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for understanding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure. Y'all go on and have fun now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, then. See ya soon, amigo! McQueen drives off. Mater watches him go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's been converted into a white-tablecloth restaurant, with cars dining al fresco and a hopping gastropub inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: have a prime table with a view of Radiator Springs and the starry night sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is so nice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't tell you how good it is to be here alone. Just the two of us. Finally, you and me --- MATER (O.S.) Good evening. Mater is at their table, dressed as a waiter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Mater and I'll be your waiter. (TO HIMSELF) Mater the waiter. That's funny right there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, you work here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well yeah I work here. What'd you think, I just snuck in here when nobody was looking and pretended to be your waiter, just so I could hang out with you? McQueen and Sally exchange a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah. How ridiculous would that be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, can I start you two lovebirds off with a couple drinks?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. I'll have my usual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what? I'm going to have that too. Mater blinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, right. Your usual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Fillmore and Sarge watch as Guido mixes drinks, ala "Cocktail." Mater arrives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guido! What's McQueen's usual?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Italian, subtitled) How should I know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect! Give me two of `em.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quiet! My program's on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Tonight on "The Mel Dorado Show"!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - "THE MEL DORADO SHOW," a cable talk show, begins with file footage of MILES AXLEROD, a sleek SUV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His story gripped the world! Oil billionaire Miles Axlerod, in an attempt to become the first car to circumnavigate the globe without
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ironically ran out of gas and found himself trapped in the wild! We see images of newspaper headlines, search crews.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feared dead, he emerged 36 days later, running on a fuel he'd distilled himself from the natural elements! Since then he's sold his oil fortune, converted himself from a gas-guzzler into an electric car, and has devoted his life to finding a renewable, clean-burning fuel!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Images of oil derricks torn down; Miles Axlerod getting converted to electric; lab scientists testing chemicals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now he claims to have done it with his Allinol. Images of fields, rivers, vegetables, and mountains all combining to form the Allinol logo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And to show the world what his new superfuel can do, he's created a racing competition like no other, inviting the greatest champions from around the globe to battle in the first ever World Grand Prix. Welcome Sir Miles Axlerod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: arrives, parks across from Mel's desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Mel. It is very good to be here. Now listen to me: Big Oil. It costs a fortune. Pollution is getting worse. I mean, come on. It's a fossil fuel. Fossil. As in dead dinosaurs. And we all know what happened to them. Alternative energy is the future. Trust me, Mel, after seeing Allinol in action at the World Grand Prix, nobody will ever go back to gasoline again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to the dinosaurs, now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And on satellite, a World Grand Prix competitor and one of the fastest cars in the world, Francesco Bernoulli. Across the screen: LIVE FROM ROME, ITALY. We meet Formula race car FRANCESCO BERNOULLI.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is an honor, Signore Dorado. For you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miles, why not invite Lightning McQueen? Mater, collecting his drinks, looks up, half-intrigued.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course we invited him. But apparently after a very long racing season he is taking some time off to rest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lightning McQueen would not have a chance against Francesco! Mater doesn't like this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can go over 300 kilometers an hour! In miles that is like, uh... way faster than McQueen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go to the phones. Baltimore, Maryland, you're on the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I on? Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're on. Go ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead, caller. Dial tone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go to Radiator Springs. You're on, caller.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that Italian feller you got on there can't talk that way about Lightning McQueen. He's the bestest race car in the whole wide world. Fillmore and Sarge look around. Mater is visible in the back of the bar on an office phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he is, how you say "the bestest race car," then why must he rest, eh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cause he knows what's important. Every now and then he prefers just to slow down, enjoy life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, you heard it! Lightning McQueen prefers to be slow! Of course, this is not news to Francesco. When I want to go to sleep I watch one of his races. After two laps I am out cold. Audible RXNS from the bar. A crowd has been forming ever since Mater started talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That ain't what I meant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - They hear the commotion inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, what's going on over there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Sally and McQueen push through the crowd, see that they're watching Francesco on the television.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's that Italian Formula car. His name is --- SALLY Francesco Bernoulli. No wonder there's a crowd. When Sally says his name, she enunciates each part, as if Italian were her mother's tongue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, why do you know his name? And don't say it like that. It's three syllables, not ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? He's nice to look at. You know, open-wheeled and all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong with fenders? I thought you like my fenders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well let me tell you something else there, Mr. San Francisco --- MCQUEEN Mater?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McQueen could drive circles around you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Driving in circles is all he can do, no?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I mean yes. I mean he could beat you anywhere, anytime, any track. On McQueen - he looks at Guido who gives a nod over to --- --- Mater, turned away from the crowd, still on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mel, can we move on? Francesco needs a caller who can provide a little more intellectual stimulation. Like a dump truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He doesn't like this at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha ha! That shows what you know. Dump trucks is dumb. Suddenly, Mater is YANKED from the booth and replaced by McQueen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, hi, this is Lightning McQueen. Look, I don't appreciate my best friend being insulted like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McQueen! That was your best friend? This is the difference between you and Francesco. Francesco knows how good he is. He does not need to surround himself with tow trucks to prove it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those are strong words from a car that is so fragile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fragile!? He calls Francesco fragile? Not so fast, McQueen!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Not so fast." What is that, your new motto? Francesco goes ballistic in Italian. They cut his mic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, this sounds like something that needs to be settled on the race course. What do you say, Lightning McQueen? We've still got room for one more racer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I would love to. The only thing is my crew's off for the season so --- A sound O.S. McQueen turns to see Fillmore, Sarge and Luigi flank a tablecloth which is hanging off the bar. Ramone backs away, having spray painted "TEAM LIGHTNING MCQUEEN" on it. Guido quickly uncorks three wine bottles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pit stop. McQueen turns back to the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what? They just got back. Deal me in, baby. Ka-chow! The place ERUPTS IN CHEERS. MOMENTS LATER - General excitement as McQueen exits the phone booth where Sally waits. Off her look:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, I know. I just got back. But we won't be long and --- SALLY Oh, no, don't worry about me. I've got enough to do here. Mater's going to have a blast though. (off McQueen's silence) You're bringing Mater, right? You never bring him to any of your races. McQueen turns to the bar where Mater privately tries their drinks, hates it, spits it back in the glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just let him sit in the pits, give him a headset. C'mon, it'll be a thrill of a lifetime for him. Mater arrives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your drinks, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't taste it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd you like to come and see the world with me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got me into this thing. You're coming along.

direction.raw_text: her wings, and knocks out two cars on her side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Guido pulls some LEMON tires off with his air gun. In seconds he has a stack of lugnuts next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pit stop. The two Pacers' tires all FALL OFF. Flo hits VLADIMIR TRUNKOV with her high-beams, BLINDING HIM. Sheriff BOOTS him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not today, boys! Guido pushes away his tireless thug, YELLING AT HIM IN ITALIAN. Mater KARATE CHOPS lemons, three and four at a time. Ramone SPRAY PAINTS a lemon's windshield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Retreat! A few Lemons turn back the way they came. BLOCKING THEIR PATH are a line of BRITISH MILITARY VEHICLES clad in digital camo, led by SARGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for the help, Corporal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything for one of pop's mates. And in the middle of all of this craziness we CUT TO --- --- MATER. WRENCH BITS are strewn all around him as Guido tries wrench after wrench to take the bolts off. No dice. Guido gestures wildly, spits Italian a mile a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's he saying?! What's wrong!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None of his wrenches fit the bolts! This is a light bulb moment for Mater. He eyes the bolts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I get it. I get it! I know what needs to be done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then do it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? No, I can't do it. Look, nobody takes me seriously. I know that now. This ain't Radiator Springs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes it is. Mater looks at McQueen. It is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're yourself in Radiator Springs. Be yourself here. And if people aren't taking you seriously, then they need to change. Not you. I know that, because I was wrong before. Now you can do this. You're the bomb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, buddy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No no no, you're the actual bomb. Now let's go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, right! Hang on! Mater HOOKS McQueen and they're off. They SHOOT PAST FINN, who's in the middle of battling lemons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's he going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Flying down a side street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Computer!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Agent Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need that thing you done before to get me away from McQueen!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Request acknowledged. The ROCKET THRUSTERS kick in. They head right for a WALL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I need you to do the chute, the second kind not the first!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deploying chute. Mater's chute POPS OPEN, catching air and sending Mater and McQueen SAILING INTO THE AIR. Mater starts to steer them the direction he wants. He and McQueen are FLYING OVER LONDON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The QUEEN, her attendants, assorted dignitaries are here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's winning the race? Mater and McQueen drop from the sky. They land and skid to a halt just before the Queen's guards who DRAW THEIR WEAPONS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back up! Back away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Lightning McQueen!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, it's okay! Tell them, Mater. Explain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay! Somebody's been sabotaging the racers and hurting the cars and I know who. Oh wait... Your Majesty. Mater BOWS to the Queen. In doing so, the TICKING TIME BOMB angles into view. The clock's at T-minus 1:53.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Bomb! - It's a bomb! - Everybody down! - Look out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hold your fire! He can't disarm it! Finn dives onto the platform and rolls between the Queen and Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, I don't know what you're doing but stand down now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (aside, to McQueen) This ain't nothing at all like Radiator Springs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, just cut to the chase!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He turns to Miles Axlerod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Me? You've got to be crazy. Everyone exchanges confused looks, including Finn and Holley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I figured it out when I realized you all attached this ticking time bomb with Whitworth bolts. The same bolts that hold together that old British engine from the photograph. Holley! Show that picture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: O-kay... Holley projects the much discussed PHOTO OF THE ENGINE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then I remembered what they say about old British engines - "If there ain't no oil under `em, there ain't no oil in `em."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is he talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was you leaking oil at the party in Japan. You just blamed it on me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Electric cars don't use oil, you twit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you're faking it. You didn't convert to no electric. We pop that hood we gonna see that engine from that picture right there. Mater moves toward Miles Axlerod to pop his hood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This lorry's crazy. He's going to kill us all! Miles Axlerod BACKS UP to the edge of the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Sir Axlerod created the race, Mater. Why would he want to hurt anyone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To make Allinol look bad so everybody'd go back to using oil. I mean, he said it himself with that disguised voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Dee-sguised voice?" What are you talking about? You're nuts, you are! The QUEEN'S GUARDS have had ENOUGH. As has the PRINCE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is going nowhere fast. We really should go, Grandmother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One moment. I'd like to see where this is going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, he created Allinol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but what if he found that huge oil field just as the world was trying to find something else? Mater sticks his ticking bomb-nose into Miles Axlerod's grill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if he came up with Allinol just to make alternative fuel look bad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "What if?" You're basing this on a "What if"?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, that's it. And the QUEEN'S GUARDS spirit the Queen and Prince Wheeliam out of there FAST --- 126.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Somebody save me! The lorry's crazy! Now it's just Miles Axlerod, Mater, McQueen, Finn and Holley. Miles Axlerod's back tires slip on the edge of the podium as he is cornered by Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep away, you idiot!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone do something! Everyone FLINCHES, DUCKS or DIVES FOR COVER except McQueen, Mater and Axlerod --- MILES AXLEROD You're insane, you are! Deactivate!! The bomb FREEZES at 00:01.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bomb deactivated. Have a nice day, Sir Axlerod. General shock all around. Miles Axlerod realizes what he's done, looks terrified. Police surround him. Mater FLINGS Miles Axlerod's hood open with his hook, revealing AN INTERNAL COMBUSTION ENGINE, oil dripping from all sides. It MATCHES the photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The engine from the photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a perfect match!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did the tow truck figure it out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's official. You're coming to all my races from now on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you're talking! Tire bump.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A massive crowd packs the adjacent streets and parks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater does the requisite "silly faces" in an attempt to break the composure of a Buckingham Palace Guard. It isn't working. McQueen approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mater, let's go. You're on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Queen sits in attention at the front of the Main Ballroom. As Mater and McQueen approach:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Majesty. May I present for the investiture of honorary Knighthood of the British Realm. Tow Mater of Radiator Springs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go get `em, buddy. McQueen joins his friends from Radiator Springs. Mater rolls forward. He bows, as if he's practiced it all day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hereby dub thee "Sir Tow Mater." Applause from all around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Sir?" Shoot, you can just call me Mater, Your Majesty. I don't wanna hear none of this "Sir" business. By the way, have y'all met each other? Queen? McQueen. McQueen, Queen. McQueen? McMissile. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: McMissile, McQueen. Queen? McMissile. He continues introducing everyone as we CUT TO --- EXT. RADIATOR SPRINGS - DAY The town sign now reads "WELCOME TO RADIATOR SPRINGS - HOME OF LIGHTNING MCQUEEN AND SIR TOW MATER."
direction.name: direction

result.heading: HOME OF LIGHTNING MCQUEEN AND SIR TOW MATER

direction.raw_text: Cars surround Mater and McQueen. The rest of the Radiator Springs gang is here too, watches. VAN and MINNY are front and center.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So there I was: rocket jets going full blast, McQueen hanging on for dear life when suddenly them two nasty lemons come out of nowhere, guns drawed. We was goners. But then out of nowhere, this beautiful spy car swoops in from the sky to save us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a very entertaining story, young man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Minny, please. Come on, none of this happened. Rocket jets? Flying spy cars?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're quite right. It does sound a bit far-fetched. The crowd turns, sees HOLLEY, wings out, swooping in. FINN is right below her, driving up the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holley! Finn!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Mater. It's so nice to see you again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our satellites picked up an urgent communique.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you got my e-mail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man. Y'all is gonna have a great time. Everybody! This here's Finn McMissile. He's a secret agent. (WHISPERS) Don't tell nobody. And this is Holley Shiftwell. She's --- HOLLEY I'm Mater's girlfriend. It's so nice to meet you all. Everyone is shocked. Including Mater. Guido's jaw drops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guido believe you now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, honey. You got a nasty dent there. Indeed, Holley still wears the dent from when she saved Mater from Grem and Acer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (already crushing on her) Was that from when you swooped in and saved them in London?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Van!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? I'm just asking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you worry, sweet pea. My baby Ramone can get that fixed up for you in no time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure thing. No problemo. Just let me go get my tools.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no no. I'm keeping that dent. It's way too valuable. Mater takes this in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "valuable" dent? Oh, she's as crazy as Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those two are perfect for each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, there's one thing I still don't get. The bad guys hit me with the beam from the camera, right? So why didn't I, you know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Explode in a fiery inferno?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We couldn't figure that one out either.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our investigation proved that Allinol was actually gasoline. And Miles Axlerod engineered it so that when it got hit by the beam it would explode.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a second. Fillmore, you said my fuel was safe. McQueen turns to Fillmore. Everyone does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're implying that I switched out that rotgut excuse for alternative fuel with my all- natural, sustainable, organic biofuel just because I never trusted Axlerod, you're dead wrong, man. (RE: SARGE) It was him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once Big Oil, always Big Oil. Man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tree hugger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A banner says "Radiator Springs Grand Prix."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rolls up the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Radiator Springs Grand Prix is about to begin! All spectators clear the starting line!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: heads up Main Street, other racers following.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, I can't wait to get rockin'. This is gonna be wicked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, we should do this every year.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just figured, we never found out who the world's fastest car is. Plus: no press, no trophy. Just racing - the way I like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Francesco likes it like this too. McQueen SEES Sally. He and Francesco approach her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Francesco. I'd like you to meet --- FRANCESCO Signorina Sally. It is official: Lightning McQueen is the luckiest car in the world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why, thank you --- FRANCESCO Which he will have to be to have a chance against Francesco today. Francesco turns to leave. As he's moving away:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you at the finish line, Mc--- Francesco STOPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that? McQueen has a new bumper sticker: "Ka-ciao, Francesco."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just something I had made up for the occasion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is good, McQueen. Very funny. It was funnier when I did it, but it's very funny. What are you going to do next? Are you going to take off your fenders? Try it. You'll like it. Francesco leaves. We stay with McQueen and Sally.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So he's not so good-looking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Nice try.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's why I love you, Sally. (as he leaves) Wish me luck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't need it! He drives off. Flo approaches Sally.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmm-mmm. That Francesco is fine- looking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And those open wheels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna have to go get myself some coolant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The racers at the starting grid. ON THE TRAFFIC LIGHT in the center of town. It goes from RED to GREEN! The RACERS SPEED OFF, tearing up main street and out of town, blazing past tourists --- EXT. WILLY'S BUTTE - DAY As the racers, led by McQueen and Francesco, take the wide, sweeping turn around Willy's Butte we CRANE UP to see MATER, FINN, HOLLEY, and the Radiator Springs gang watching. Everyone CHEERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go McQueen!! Whoo-hoo!!! Holley gets an alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finn, time to go. Siddeley's gassed, geared and ready to fly. Finn starts to back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're leaving already?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got another mission, Mater. Just stopped by here to "pick something up." They both eye Mater, expectantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something tells me you're not talking about souvenir bumper stickers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her Majesty asked for you personally, Mater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I told you all before. I'm not a spy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spy or not, you're still the smartest, most honest chap we've ever met.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't forget massively charming. Mater looks over at Holley. He looks touched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, thanks. But as much fun as it was hanging with y'all, this... He looks over to his friends who watch the race, CHEER MCQUEEN ON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's alright, we understand. But I'll be back. You still owe me that first date.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If there's ever anything I can do for you, just let me know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I sure appreciate that, thank you. (THINKS) Actually... there is one thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blazing forward fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoo-hoo!!! He ROCKETS FORWARD, through the whole town. In doing so he
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hooking him --- OTIS Whoa!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and TOSSING him right into Ramone's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Thanks, Mater!
direction.name: direction
